title: How to Fix Age Protection on TikTok to See Restricted Content

steps.title: Open the TikTok app.
steps.content: Open the TikTok app. TikTok has an icon that resembles a blue, white, and red music note. Tap the TikTok icon on your Home screen or Apps menu to open TikTok. If you do not have TikTok installed, you can download and install it for free from the Google Play Store on Android devices, or the App Store on iPhone and iPad.

steps.title: Tap Profile.
steps.content: Tap Profile . It's the icon that resembles a person in the lower-right corner. This displays your profile.

steps.title: Tap the menu ☰ button.
steps.content: Tap the menu ☰ button. It's the icon with three horizontal lines in the upper-right corner. This displays the menu. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Settings and privacy.
steps.content: Tap Settings and privacy . It's the last option in the menu that appears at the bottom. It's next to an icon that resembles a gear. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Content preferences.
steps.content: Tap Content preferences . It's about halfway down the menu below the "Content & Display" header. It's next to an icon that resembles a video camera. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Restricted Mode.
steps.content: Tap Restricted Mode . It's the second option in the menu. If restricted mode is enabled, it will say "On" across from this option. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Turn off.
steps.content: Tap Turn off . It's the large red button at the bottom of the menu. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Enter your 4-digit passcode.
steps.content: Enter your 4-digit passcode. When you activate Restricted Mode, you are asked to create a 4-digit passcode. Enter your 4-digit passcode to continue. If you have forgotten your passcode, tap " Forgot Passcode? " in the center of the screen. Then select if you want to receive a text or email. You will receive instructions on how to reset your passcode via the method you selected.

steps.title: Tap Next.
steps.content: Tap Next . It's the red button at the bottom. This disables Restricted Mode. Mature content will not longer be restricted.

steps.title: Open the TikTok app.
steps.content: Open the TikTok app. TikTok has an icon that resembles a blue, white, and red music note. If you entered your birthday wrong when setting up your account, you will need to contact customer service in order to change your age. If you are suspected of lying about your age, your account may be permanently banned. Only use this method if you're really over 18.

steps.title: Tap Profile.
steps.content: Tap Profile . It's the icon that resembles a person in the lower-right corner. This displays your profile.

steps.title: Tap the menu ☰ button.
steps.content: Tap the menu ☰ button. It's the icon with three horizontal lines in the upper-right corner. This displays the menu.

steps.title: Tap Settings and privacy.
steps.content: Tap Settings and privacy . It's the last option in the menu that appears at the bottom. It's next to an icon that resembles a gear.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Report a problem.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Report a problem . It's near the bottom of the Settings and privacy settings menu. It's the first option below the header that says "Support & About." This displays a list of common topics that people have problems with. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Account and profile.
steps.content: Tap Account and profile . It's the first option below "Topics." This displays a list of topics related to your account and profile.

steps.title: Tap Editing profile.
steps.content: Tap Editing profile . It's the second to last option from the bottom. This expands a menu that displays more topics related to editing your profile.

steps.title: Tap Other.
steps.content: Tap Other . It's the last option below "Editing profile." This is the option you select when no other available options are relevant to your problem.

steps.title: Tap Need more help?.
steps.content: Tap Need more help? . It's the last option at the bottom of the screen. This option lets send a message to TikTok support.

steps.title: Write a message and tap Submit.
steps.content: Write a message and tap Submit . Write a brief message explaining that you accidentally entered your birthday wrong and that you would like to change it so that mature content is no longer restricted. You can also include a photo of your ID as verification of your age. Tap the red button that says "Submit' when you are done. To include a photo of your ID, take a picture of it with your phone. Make sure your name and birthday are clearly visible. Then tap the icon that resembles a photograph in the "Report a problem" screen on TikTok. Select the photo of your ID. You can select up to 4 photos. Alternatively, you can email "TikTok at infocontact@tiktok.com," "feedback@tiktok.com," or "business-servicesupport@tiktok.com."

steps.title: Open the TikTok app.
steps.content: Open the TikTok app. TikTok has an icon that resembles a blue, white, and red music note. Tap the TikTok icon on your Home screen or Apps menu to open TikTok. If you have contacted TikTok and you are not able to resolve the 'age protected' error issue, your last resort is to create a new account.

steps.title: Tap Profile.
steps.content: Tap Profile . It's the icon that resembles a person in the lower-right corner. This displays your profile.

steps.title: Tap your name.
steps.content: Tap your name. It's at the top of the page. This displays the option to switch accounts at the bottom of the app.

steps.title: Tap Add account.
steps.content: Tap Add account . This displays the option to sign up for or log in to a new TikTok account. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Use phone or email.
steps.content: Tap Use phone or email . It's the first option in the menu. This allows you to sign up for a new account using your email or phone number. Alternatively, you can sign up with your Gmail account or

steps.title: Enter your birthdate and tap Next.
steps.content: Enter your birthdate and tap Next . If you want to access content flagged as mature or inappropriate, you will need to enter a birthday that is at least 18 years old. Be sure to enter the correct birthday. Warning: If you are under 18 years old and you are suspected of entering the incorrect birthday to access mature content, your account may be permanently banned.

steps.title: Tap the Email tab at the top.
steps.content: Tap the Email tab at the top. This option allows you to create a new account with an email address.

steps.title: Enter your email address and tap Next.
steps.content: Enter your email address and tap Next . You'll need to use a different email address than the one you used to sign up for your first account. Enter an alternate email address and tap the red button that says Next at the bottom. If you don't have an alternate email account, you can sign up for a new Gmail account for free . You may be asked to verify that you are a person. If so, simply drag the slider bar at the bottom of the image until the puzzle piece fits in the correct space. If you are asked to verify your email, open the email account you enter and look for an email from TikTok. Open the email and write down the verification code. Enter the verification code in the TikTok app.

steps.title: Enter a password and tap Next.
steps.content: Enter a password and tap Next . Enter your desired password, and then enter it again to confirm your password. Tap the red button that says Next when you are finished.

steps.title: Enter your desired username and tap Sign Up.
steps.content: Enter your desired username and tap Sign Up . Enter your desired username and tap the red button that says " Sign Up " at the bottom. This creates a new account. If you entered an email that is over the age of 18, you can view all content on TikTok freely without age restrictions using your new account. If your old account has a sizable following, you may want to make sure your new username is similar to your old one so that your followers can find you. You may also want to post a TikTok on your old account informing your followers that you have a new account.
